alert.note: Alert for Polk County Lower Elevations; Southeast Polk County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 1:56PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Polk County through 215 PM CDT... At 155 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Vandervoort, or 14 miles south of Mena, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wickes... Grannis... Hatfield... Vandervoort... Cossatot River State Park... Hartley... Mccauley... Cove... Hatton... Bogg Springs... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Polk County Lower Elevations; Southeast Polk County Higher Elevations
